scripts.dev: webpack serve --mode development --open browser-sync start --proxy 'localhost/app-event' --files 'src/**/*.php, public/css/*.css, public/js/*.js'
scripts.sass: sass index.scss css/index.css && sass css/dashboard.scss css/dashboard.css && sass css/auth.scss css/auth.css && sass css/create.scss css/create.css && sass css/manage.scss css/manage.css && sass css/edit.scss css/edit.css && sass css/
scripts.sass:watch: sass --watch index.scss:css/index.css css/dashboard.scss:css/dashboard.css css/auth.scss:css/auth.css css/create.scss:css/create.css css/manage.scss:css/manage.css css/edit.scss:css/edit.css
